definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Snow lion, mythological animal, a banned symbol of Tibet and Tibetan Buddhism
Snow lion banner, banned flag of Tibetan independence movement, featuring mythological Snow Leopard

sentences.english: Big old Tinker. He's chased mountain lions before.
sentences.chinese: 老叮噹這個大傢伙，它以前追過山獅呢。

sentences.english: He said there was no evidence so far that mountain lions were susceptible to the disease.
sentences.chinese: 他說，目前尚無證據表明山獅是否易感此類疾病。

sentences.english: Mountain lions live in mountainous areas of the western United States.
sentences.chinese: 山獅棲息在美國西部的山區裏。

definition: vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
Andes mountain chain of South America
after the calamity, renewed life (idiom); new lease of life
Zhuangwei or Chuangwei township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
on call/always available/ready at all times

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1
